public byte[] Serialize(bool isClient, Reserved? reserved = null, long maxFrameSize = 9223372036854775807, INonceGenerator? nonceGenerator = null)

Parameters

isClient bool

If true this is a client message, otherwise it is a server message.

reserved Reserved?

The reserved bits.

maxFrameSize long

The maximum size of a frame.

nonceGenerator INonceGenerator

A generator for client masks.
